1: /@@//ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cang kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rj btsun mo'i bha grnams ya bzhugs so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
2: sku dang gsung dang thags kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las shin du ches gsang ba'ang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' srtsal pa/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3: chen po rdo rje snying po snying rje chen po legs so legs so/rdo rje sem dpa' dang/semas dpa' chen po dang /dm tshig sems dpa' chen po dang steing po kye'i rdo rje zhes ba ba nyon cig /
4: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//gang phyar rdo rje sems dpa' lags//ji lar sems dpa' chen po lags//gang gis dame tshig sems dpa' lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsubs//
5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa//rdo rje mi phyed ces byar brjod//sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa//'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod//
6: ye shes chen po'i ros gang ba//sems dpa'chen por brjod par bya//rtag tu dam tshig la spyod phyir//dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/mir bsdus
7: pa ni ji lta bu//gang zhig kye yi rdo rje lags//e yi rnam pas ci zhig shad //bdza yis kyang de bzhin cing//bcom ldan 'nas kyis bka' stul pa//de ni snying rje chen po nyid//bdza
8: 'ang shes rab brjod par bya//thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgud//de ni da yis bshang kyis nyon//ltha stangs dgug dang brda chen dang//don chen rnams mang brjod pa dang //rengs par
